short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the power of audioburst, use this extension to add Talk Audio to your google searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the power of Audioburst you can now get Search Results from Radio & Podcasts.
You can now listen to over 130 playlists by clicking the extension button.
